Name: Magical Girl Creator
About the game: Want to create your own magical girl? Now you can with the ultimate magical girl creator! Choose from tons of cute outfits and hairstyles to create the magical girl or female superheroine of your dreams! What is a Magical Girl? Magical girls (mahou shoujo) are young girls endowed with magical powers. They are young female superheroines who fight crime and the forces of evil! Features 5 Gorgeous Dresses (with various colors) 6 Stunning Hairstyles (with various colors) 6 Beautiful Accessories (hair accessories, wands, and jewelry) 10+ Different facial expressions Saving your character as a transparent .PNG image
